description: Approval of details submitted in compliance with Condition 13c & 13d (Living Roof and Landscaping) of the planning permission DC/14/89902 dated 4 March 2015 (as amended by s73 application DC 16/96453 dated 22 July 2016) for the demolition of existing garages adjacent to 23 Boone Street SE13 and the construction of a four storey building comprising 3 x 1 bedroom and 4 x 2 bedroom flats; the demolition of existing garages adjacent to 24 Lee Church Street and 39 Boone Street and the construction of a part 4, part 5 storey building comprising 3 x 1 bedroom, 10 x 2 bedroom, 3 x 3 bedroom and 2 x 4 bedroom flats, together with associated refuse and cycle storage and landscaping works including the provision of a new childrens play area facing Lee Church Street, an additional 9 car parking spaces and the reconfiguration of the existing garage block accessed off Boone Street to provide 7 car parking spaces.
site_name: DACRE PARK ESTATE, DACRE PARK, LONDON, SE13
